original_text: And the children of Israel did according to all that the Lord commanded Moses: so they pitched by their standards, and so they set forward, every one after their families, according to the house of their fathers.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 다 준행하여 각기 종족과 조상의 가문에 따르며 자기들의 기를 따라 진 치기도 하며 행진하기도 하였더라

sentences.original_text: And the children of Israel did
according to all that the Lord commanded Moses
so they pitched by their standards
according to the house of their fathers
